bibl.title: Remapping the Mediterranean: The Argo Adventure in Apollonius and Callimachus.
bibl.note: Callimachus' Argo adventure [in the Aetia] now includes six papyrus fragments.

bibl.title: Culture in Pieces. Essays on Ancient Texts in Honour of Peter Parsons.

bibl.seg: Stephens Susan, Remapping the Mediterranean: The Argo Adventure in Apollonius and Callimachus.
Dirk Obbink and Richard Rutherford (Edd.), Culture in Pieces. Essays on Ancient Texts in Honour of Peter Parsons (Oxford, 2011) pp. 188-207.
